医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家发现控制瘙痒和炎症的反馈回路偶尔抓挠瘙痒可以缓解疼痛，但当瘙痒失控时，可能会成为严重的健康问题。身体如何知道何时停止？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Scientists-discover-feedback-loop-that-c​​ontrols-itch-and-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Scientists-discover-feedback-loop-that-c​​ontrols-itch-and-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14d1577e-c4b8-4ac9-b9f3-d8afa32a6970 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 20:53:41 -0400 Scientists discover feedback loop that controls itch and inflammation
热量限制可以使肌肉恢复活力并激活健康衰老的生物途径美国国立卫生研究院的研究人员及其同事表示，减少总体卡路里摄入量可能会让您的肌肉恢复活力，并激活对健康至关重要的生物途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Calorie-restriction-may-rejuvenate-muscles-and-activate-biological-pathways-for-healthy-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Calorie-restriction-may-rejuvenate-muscles-and-activate-biological-pathways-for-healthy-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31f25c54-4293-48ed-a9b0-43f110b885ed Fri, 13 Oct 2023 20:41:22 -0400 Calorie restriction may rejuvenate muscles and activate biological pathways for healthy aging
加州大学洛杉矶分校获得资助以改善早期肺癌检测的液体活检来自 UCLA Jonsson 综合癌症中心和 UCLA 牙科学院的一组研究人员从美国国家癌症研究所获得了为期五年的 460 万美元拨款，用于开发和改进早期检测肺癌的液体活检技术；美国男性和女性癌症死亡的主要原因https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/UCLA-receives-grant-to-improve-liquid-biopsy-for-early-lung-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/UCLA-receives-grant-to-improve-liquid-biopsy-for-early-lung-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5dd85266-2be4-4bd3-8e29-6e2ad2e1b8f4 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 20:36:24 -0400 UCLA receives grant to improve liquid biopsy for early lung cancer detection
肯塔基大学被选为 NIH 种族平等倡议全国协调中心肯塔基大学已被选为美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 倡议的全国协调中心。 Danelle Stevens-Watkins 博士将作为首席研究员领导国家药物滥用研究所 (NIDA) 种族平等倡议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/University-of-Kentucky-selected-as-the-nationwide-coordination-center-for-NIH-racial-equity-initiative.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/University-of-Kentucky-selected-as-the-nationwide-coordination-center-for-NIH-racial-equity-initiative.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2804a266-b7ac-4a4f-ab61-fd877d7e7850 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 20:29:13 -0400 University of Kentucky selected as the nationwide coordination center for NIH racial equity initiative
研究发现控制严重出血的新技术会增加死亡风险苏格兰阿伯丁大学的一项新研究发现，一种用于控制受伤患者严重出血的新技术会增加死亡风险，该研究由阿拉巴马大学伯明翰分校创伤外科医生和扬·詹森教授领导。博士詹森 (Jansen) 在 2017 年移居美国之前，曾是阿伯丁的一名外科医生和研究员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/New-technique-to-control-severe-bleeding-increases-risk-of-death-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/New-technique-to-control-severe-bleeding-increases-risk-of-death-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c90528eb-8dcd-4f4e-9eb6-0979ff802b93 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 20:23:37 -0400 New technique to control severe bleeding increases risk of death, study finds
剪彩仪式标志着肯塔基州儿童医院四个儿科专科诊所的开业10 月 10 日星期二，剪彩仪式标志着肯塔基州里士满路儿童医院正式开业，该医院是四家儿科专科诊所的新所在地。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Ribbon-cutting-ceremony-marks-the-opening-of-Kentucky-Childrens-four-pediatric-specialty-clinics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Ribbon-cutting-ceremony-marks-the-opening-of-Kentucky-Childrens-four-pediatric-specialty-clinics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddc9ed40-7caf-44c7-82fb-2fc23498839f Fri, 13 Oct 2023 20:00:49 -0400 Ribbon-cutting ceremony marks the opening of Kentucky Children's four pediatric specialty clinics
80万英镑拨款用于促进噬菌体的开发以对抗疾病开发有效且安全的噬菌体来对抗疾病的开创性工作已获得 80 万英镑的资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/c2a3800000-grant-to-boost-the-development-of-bacteriophages-to-combat-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/c2a3800000-grant-to-boost-the-development-of-bacteriophages-to-combat-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f90cf0d9-cf81-4f93-9e51-3795632b2226 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 19:52:10 -0400 £800,000 grant to boost the development of bacteriophages to combat disease
研究人员发现了可以提高粪便微生物移植成功率的基因来自健康捐赠者的粪便微生物移植可以治疗复发性艰难梭菌感染的患者。然而，经过数万次移植后，人们对哪些供体菌株提供长期植入以及哪些在移植后早期植入知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Researchers-identify-genes-that-may-improve-success-of-fecal-microbe-transplants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Researchers-identify-genes-that-may-improve-success-of-fecal-microbe-transplants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8ec6dd4-5fb5-4d1c-ab69-c03aac8e370b Fri, 13 Oct 2023 19:48:09 -0400 Researchers identify genes that may improve success of fecal microbe transplants
痴呆症危险因素对少数族裔影响更大伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，增加痴呆风险的因素对少数族裔人群的风险影响更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Dementia-risk-factors-have-greater-impact-on-minority-ethnic-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Dementia-risk-factors-have-greater-impact-on-minority-ethnic-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=127102a4-761a-4871-b134-a03b77819b1b Fri, 13 Oct 2023 19:33:24 -0400 Dementia risk factors have greater impact on minority ethnic groups
研究人员表示，社会需要为公共场所母乳喂养提供更明确、明确的支持国际法支持妇女在公共场合母乳喂养的权利。然而，女性报告称，在外出母乳喂养时，她们会受到负面反应和评判性的目光。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Societies-need-to-give-clearer-explicit-support-for-breastfeeding-in-public-researchers-say.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Societies-need-to-give-clearer-explicit-support-for-breastfeeding-in-public-researchers-say.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c3a08f8-5166-44ac-be1d-50fc8db0a40c Fri, 13 Oct 2023 19:28:47 -0400 Societies need to give clearer, explicit support for breastfeeding in public, researchers say
